text:
ws about the possibilities 
o Be supportive and encouraging; keep calm - your calm energy will help her 
o Allow the woman to adopt the position of her choice: propped up, sitting, squatting, kneeling, 
semi-Fowler’s or wedged supine. Avoid the flat supine position (lying flat on the back), as the pregnant 
uterus will compress the inferior vena cava 
o Encourage pushing/ bearing down only during contractions 
o Protect the perineum when the fetal head crowns 
• Duration of active pushing:
